description: Great app and reasonably trouble free, got my quake files by installing my original CD. If you do this the id1 directory and pak files need to be renamed to lowercase for the Quakespasm to work otherwise it will just keep asking for the Quake directory.
summary: Excellent App to get good old Quake working

description: like mentioned above all folders and files must be lowercase.

I used DosBox to install the game from the original CD then renamed folders with lower case letters as per the advice in other reviews. The only other thing was that I needed to temporarily disable the dock when playing the game as I would lose mouse control if the mouse strayed over the dock.
it loops at "select ID1 folder" window. Whenewer you select it this window will shown again and again and again.
